Lines: Okay, guys. This time we're going out on a heist.
...but it was originaly Zeon base,
so you can call it salvage operation.
Information is solid.
It's good place to start with securing our supplies.
Next step after harrasment is theft...
Hehehe... the scoundrels are getting together.
What is in the storage cache?
It's something that was stored unofficially.
Most likely it was something to embezzle after the war.
In other words. Money.
Gold and diamonds are best, because its easy to pawn them.
But currently even rare metals, like zircon which is essential
for thermonuclear reactos, should be very valuable.
Wooow! Treasure of gold and silver! So romantic!
Well, no one can complain about cat burglar, can they?
Everyone, including us, is heading toward Africa.
It would be great to obtain military funds before hiding.
It's a bit of a waste...
Haha, don't be like that.
Well then, lets go rob the bank!
Roger that!
